Overview 

For a candidate to be able to retake your test (which is submitting another attempt after the most recent one), you can either re-invite the candidates to the same Test (when you do so, a candidate's Test status initializes to "Invited").

Note: When Candidates try to access a Test for a reattempt, sometimes, a browser-level cache may disallow them from logging in to the test. To overcome this issue, it is recommended that your candidates access the Test link using a new browser window.

To re-invite candidates to a test, you can select one or more candidates from the Candidates tab in your test and click on 'Re-invite Candidate,' as shown below. For more information on re-inviting candidates, please read the full article here.

 Note: When you re-invite a candidate, the most recent attempt by the candidate is archived. A candidate can be re-invited as many times as needed.
title: How to Allow Candidates to Retake a Test?
